title: Ubuntu 14.04 Issue
body: Im Running Ubuntu Linux 14.04 And when i get to the "Launch" Screen it immediately crashes and it wont ever open past the "Launch" screen

replies.body:
Linux is not yet a supported OS. Hopefully they will support more systems in the future, but not now, I am afraid.

[Source](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)

While there's no *official support*, there are lots of players that have found luck running League on Ubuntu and other Debian-based Linux distributions using [**PlayOnLinux**](https://www.playonlinux.com/en/) or [**WINE.**](https://www.winehq.org/) Both methods are backed by a pretty awesome community and forums if you need help along the way.

I hope you're able to get things running with those resources. Let me know if you have any other questions. Keep that FOSS spirit alive, friend!
